name: World Bender (ARHD)
description:
World Bender is a short but fun puzzle platformer where you guide a rock towards his destination by using his amazing powers over the 4 elements.

CONTROLS:

Earth: Hover over a wall and click to summon a pillar of dirt to lift or propel you

Water: Select Water from the tool bar and Click where you want to place the cloud

Wind: Select Wind from the tool bar and press Space to fly upwards

Fire: Select Fire from the tool bar and click a bush to burn it away

Credits:

Head Developer, Director, Music, and Art
